preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 10 g of Acetate, 50 g of Bismuth, and 20 g of Lithium using a digital scale. 
 2. In a clean, dry container, add all three materials together. 
 3. Use a mortar and pestle to grind the mixture until homogeneous.
